src:
Stiže veliko pojačanje: Partizan u završnim pregovorima sa Amerikancem
01 Nov 2019, 16:27 by Zile
Košarkaši Partizana sjajno igraju u Evrokupu, u ABA ligi su doživeli dva poraza u prve četiri utakmice, a narednih dana mogli bi da dobiju veliko pojačanje pred nastavak sezone.
Prema navodima Maxbetsporta crno-beli su u završnim pregovorima sa Džejmsom Belom, koji već ima iskustvo igranja u ABA ligi pošto je nastupao za Cedevitu i Budućnost.
Amerikanac je prošlu sezonu počeo u Cedeviti za koju je na 13 utakmica prosečno postizao 13.5 poena, a krajem prošle sezone pojačao je Budućnost.
U dresu Podgoričana imao je prosek od 8.5 poena po utakmici, uz 42 odsto pogođenih šuteva za 3 poena.
U karijeri je nastupao za Kremonu, Nansi, Hapoel Holon i Darušafaku.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Great reinforcement arrives: Partisan in final negotiations with American
01 Nov 2019, 15:27 by Zile
Partizan basketball players play great in Eurocup, they suffered two defeats in the ABA league in the first four games, and in the next few days they could get a big boost before the season continues.
According to Maxbetsport, black and whites are in final talks with James Bell, who already has experience playing in the ABA league since playing for Cedevita and Future.
The American started last season in Cedevita, for which he averaged 13.5 points in 13 games, and at the end of last season he boosted the future.
In Podgoricans jersey, he averaged 8.5 points per game, with 42 percent of his 3-point shots.
In his career, he has performed for Cremona, Nancy, Hapoel Holon and Darushafak.
